public_dns_names.description: Public DNS names associated with the Instance

private_dns_names.description: Private DNS names associated with the Instance

public_ip_addresses.description: Public IP addresses associated with the Instance

private_ip_addresses.description: Private IP addresses associated with the Instance

description.example_definition: Prod server running LAMP in us-east-1

legacy_id.description:
Instance ID used in the legacy platform. (Note: if the "is_next" attribute is true,
            then this ID cannot be used to view the instance directly via the RightScale Dashboard.
            Next instances may be viewed from their incarnator's page.)

resource_uid.description: Instance ID used by the cloud provider

is_next.description: Whether or not this is a "next" Instance

locked.description: Whether or not the Instance is locked

actions.description: List of possible actions that can be performed on the Instance

created_at.description: When the Instance was first created

updated_at.description: When the Instance was last updated

stranded_at.description: When the Instance stranded if it stranded

pending_at.description:
When the cloud provider accepted the request to create the
              Instance

booted_at.description: When the Instance booted up if it did

operational_at.description: When the Instance became operational if it has become operational

terminated_at.description: When the Instance terminated if it did

os_platform.description: Image operating system platform of the Instance if known

tags.description: List of tags associated with the Instance

ssh_host.description: Host name that can be used to SSH into the Instance

server_template.description: The ServerTemplate associated with the Instance

security_groups.description: List of SecurityGroups associated with the Instance

subnets.description: List of Subnets associated with the Instance

networks.description: List of Networks associated with the Instance

ip_addresses.description: List of IpAddresses associated with the Instance

image.description: Link to the Image used by the Instance

multi_cloud_image.description: Link to the MultiCloudImage used by the Instance

deployment.description: Link to the Deployment where the Instance exists

ssh_key.description: Link to the SshKey used by the Instance

security_groups.description: Link to the collection of SecurityGroups associated with the Instance

subnets.description: Link to the collection of Subnets associated with the Instance

computed_multi_cloud_image.description: Link to the computed MultiCloudImage for the Instance

computed_image.description: Link to the computed Image for the Instance

account.description: Link to the Account where the Instance exist

datacenter.description: Link to the Datacenter where the Instance exist

instance_type.description: Link to the InstanceType of the Instance

cloud.description: Link to the Cloud where the Instance exist

incarnator.description: Incarnator of the Instance if there is one
